net.nutch.analysis
Class CommonGrams

java.lang.Object
  net.nutch.analysis.CommonGrams
public class CommonGrams
extends Object

Construct n-grams for frequently occuring terms and phrases while indexing. Optimize phrase queries to use the n-grams. Single terms are still indexed too, with n-grams overlaid. This is achieved through the use of Token.setPositionIncrement(int).

Method Summary

          Construct a token filter that inserts n-grams for common terms.
